name: REDVIIL
description: Now it's 2143, my name is Alice, I was born in a small settlement called Gwaine. I dream to continue the work of my great-grandfather: to find a cure for the "Red Death" and release people living in hundreds of bunkers.
minimum_requirements: OS: 64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: For all sound cards
